snippet: The Northwestern football team has not won a bowl game since 1949. Its men's basketball team has never made the N.C.A.A. tournament--could it be a different story this year?
abstract: The Northwestern football team has not won a bowl game since 1949. Its men's basketball team has never made the N.C.A.A. tournament--could it be a different story this year?

headline.main: With One Drought Continuing, Northwestern Looks to End Another
